articles.author: Ryan Gajewski
articles.title: Inside ‘Elio’s’ “Catastrophic” Path: America Ferrera’s Exit, Director Change and Erasure of Queer Themes - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Creatives at Pixar who saw the original director's previous cut of 'Elio' tell THR about the movie's challenging production process: "'Elio' just [became] about totally nothing."
articles.content: Those who worked at Pixar while its latest film release, Elio, was in production were delighted by footage they saw roughly two years ago. Among the moments cited as favorites by those at the animati… [+9981 chars]

articles.title: Digestive issues are on the rise in the US. Here are 5 of the most common conditions. - AOL.com
articles.description: With a rising prevalence of gastrointestinal issues among Americans, Live It Up broke down the five most common conditions.
